resources.string: Album artwork from your music library
Artwork will only be downloaded if a WiFi connection is available.
Muzei Music Extension needs permission to access your notifications, in order to see which song is currently playing.
Choose an image from your device, which will display when no music is playing.
If unchecked, the extension will always display the last album art, even if no music is playing.
Muzei Music Extension requires read & write access to external storage, in order to retrieve and save artwork images.

Muzei Music Extension works much better if it can listen for song changes. To do this, it needs to register as a notification listener. \n\nThis is required for many popular apps, including Spotify and Pandora.
Muzei Music Extension is not enabled as a Notification Listener. This is required for listening to track changes for many popular apps, including Spotify and Pandora.
